text: After Saul had assumed the kingship over Israel, he fought against all his enemies on every sideâ€”the Moabites, the Ammonites, the Edomites, the kings 14:47 MT; DSS and LXX king of Zobah, and the Philistines. Wherever he turned, he routed them.14:47 Or he inflicted punishment on them from Hebrew; LXX he was victorious
